data.title: Pop Music Genre
data.meta_description: Pop music genre - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides descriptions of various music genres including pop, hip hop, rock, rhythm and blues, soul, reggae, country, funk, folk, jazz, disco, classical, electronic, blues, new age, Christian, traditional, ska, Indian classical, metal, Brazilian, flamenco, salsa, merengue, and bachata. It then provides more detailed descriptions of the blues and jazz genres, noting their origins and influences from African and European music traditions. Key elements that influenced the development of blues included work songs, spirituals, and the combination of African and Western music after the end of slavery. Jazz originated from a mixture of blues and European harmony and scales.
